item.title: Automating Azure VM Deployment: The Power of PowerApps, SharePoint, Flow and Azure DevOps Pipe
item.description: Introduction Many of our customers are trying to balance the productivity vs security scale at this point in time. On the one end you can provide access to the Azure Portal but that could provide certain risks and requires an understanding of the portal. On the other hand, if you do not give access to the portal your Operational Teams will not only have to deal with their original workloads of building infrastructure on premises but also creating infrastructure in multiple online clouds.
